{{drawgraph:

target.1 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:machine.CPU.utilisation|m,
    alias:CPU time $tag_cpu_nr,
    interval:1m,
    condition:gid={gid} AND nid={id},
    groupby:gid nid cpu_nr,
    query:'SELECT mean(value) FROM "machine.CPU.utilisation|m" WHERE "gid" = "106" AND "nid" = "2" AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "gid", "nid", "cpu_nr"',

cfg.title = 'CPU time'
cfg.dashboardtitle = 'Node {nodename} ({gid}:{id}) CPU time 2'
cfg.height = 275px
cfg.width = 500px
cfg.stack = true
cfg.fill = 3
cfg.y_format = s
cfg.datasource = influxdb_controller

}}
